abstract: Cereal maker Post Holdings says it is buying MOM Brands for $1.15 billion
lead_paragraph: The cereal maker is acquiring a portfolio of products free of additives and preservatives.
snippet: The cereal maker is acquiring a portfolio of products free of additives and preservatives.
